subject: Re: TOO COOL FOR SCHOOL WEBSITE LAYOUT

full_threads.body:
Hi Leila,

Confirming that we have actioned this. Let us know if you would like further changes.

@rica done for this updates
- update collections old images to new
- update banner responsive issue
- update world coolest brand letter smaller

https://www.toocoolforschool.net.au/

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Jaime Velasquez

full_threads.body:
Hi Rica

It's still looks not right ，

the banner image split in to few parts.

2nd -the collections are old image, not the up to date one.


3rd, can you make the world coolest brand letter smaller?? this mobile version looks like for elder people or fuzzy eye sight? :(

Can you make it modern and nice look layout? I just feel the mobile version looks so wrong.

Hi Leila,

Confirming that we have updated the mobile responsiveness of the website. Let us know if you would like further changes.

@rica  done for this responsive updates
please check https://www.toocoolforschool.net.au/
@jaime can you please look into this, thanks!

Hi team thank you but its not fit on mobile? Could you please adjust?

Leila Cui

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Pending

full_threads.body:
Hi Leila,

Confirming that we have actioned this. Let us know if you would like further changes.

- update heading text to NEW ITEMS
- done in homepage live

https://www.toocoolforschool.net.au/
@jaime this is also great. Please change 'NEW ITEM' to be 'NEW ITEMS' (the client made a typo). Then add to home page of the live site and @rica is clear to send to the client. Thanks!

@rica  done for this updates

https://staging-toocoolforschool.kinsta.cloud/
- update best sellers section (make 4 column to 2 columns, cant make it 3 columns because theres 4 products)
- add new item/recent products section

please let me know if there's any changes, thanks

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Jaime Velasquez

full_threads.body:
Hi Team

The website too cool for school
could you please update as below? Please keep this as reference, we can copy them as we are authrized. http://en.toocoolforschool.com/


the banner as it is, in the banner and collections, can you add "BEST SELLER" the current website the products are too small, can you make the size as http://en.toocoolforschool.com/?
the Collection part remain as it is, then add the session " new item" like http://en.toocoolforschool.com/





I hope I read clear to understand. Sorry , and thank you, please feel free ask me is its not clear .

Best regards,
Leila
